oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Parole for C. S. O. Rice at the end of the Civil war
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Parole for Charles Stephens Olin Rice, 2nd Lt., Co. M, 7th Tenn. Cav. Regt., CSA. Rice was captured at Vicksburg. He was born February 12, 1841, in Lauderdale County, Tenn. Rice was the son of Shadrack and Louisa Linerieux Rice. He married Lucie Quarles Estes. Rice was a graduate of Cumberland University. He died Dec. 17, 1924, in Lauderdale County. He was a member of the Tennessee General Assembly (1875-1877).
